name: Barbell Bench Press (Alternate)
instructions: Flat bench press; use spotter when needed.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Press dumbbells on incline bench (30-45째).

name: Dumbbell Chest Fly
instructions: Lie on bench, lower dumbbells in wide arc, bring together over chest.

name: Cable Chest Fly
instructions: Bring handles together in arc motion.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: Press barbell overhead from collarbone.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: Raise arms to side until shoulder height.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Raise arm to side with cable to shoulder height.

name: Cable Face Pull
instructions: Pull rope toward face with elbows high.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Hinge at hips, row barbell to ribs.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Hinge at hip, row dumbbell to lower ribs.

name: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Pull bar to upper chest under control.

name: Pull-up
instructions: Pull chest to bar, full range if able.

name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
instructions: Neutral grip, curl dumbbells upward.

name: Cable Curl
instructions: Curl bar to shoulders with controlled motion.

name: EZ Bar Curl
instructions: Curl bar up with elbows stable.

name: Barbell Back Squat
instructions: Bar across traps; squat to parallel with neutral spine.
precautions: Use safe depth; avoid knees valgus.

name: Barbell Front Squat
instructions: Hold barbell on front shoulders, squat upright.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Press weight upward with feet shoulder-width on sled.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hip hinge, lower bar below knees, extend hips to rise.
precautions: Flat back, do not lock knees.

name: Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Curl legs toward glutes under control.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Bridge hips up with barbell across pelvis.

name: Cable Glute Kickback
instructions: Attach ankle strap, extend leg backward against resistance.

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Rise onto toes, hold, and descend slowly.

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Crunch with rope attachment, elbows to knees.

name: Band External Rotation
instructions: Anchor band at elbow height. Keep elbow by side at 90째. Rotate forearm outward slowly and return.
precautions: Avoid sharp pain. Start very light.

name: Band Face Pull
instructions: Anchor band at head height. Pull toward face, elbows high, squeeze scapulae.

name: Push-up
instructions: Keep a straight line, lower chest to ~5cm from floor, press up.
precautions: Avoid low-back sag; regress to incline if needed.

name: Incline Push-up
instructions: Hands on elevated surface; perform push-up with neutral spine.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Press dumbbells up while maintaining scapular stability.

name: Barbell Bent-over Row (Alt)
instructions: Hinge and row the barbell keeping back flat.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Pull chest toward bar with the body straight.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold weight at chest and squat keeping upright torso.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell/Barbell)
instructions: Hinge at hips, feel stretch in hamstrings, maintain neutral spine.

name: Single-leg RDL
instructions: Hinge on one leg, keep hips square, control descent.

name: Hip Thrust (DB/Barbell)
instructions: Top of hip bridge; squeeze glutes at lockout.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Drive hips up, pause, lower under control.

name: Step-up (box)
instructions: Step up leading with full foot, control descent.

name: Clamshell
instructions: Lie on side, knees bent. Open top knee against band.

name: Banded Lateral Walk
instructions: Low squat, step laterally keeping tension on band.

name: Bird Dog
instructions: Reach opposite arm and leg, keep neutral spine.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Opposite arm/leg lowers while maintaining neutral spine.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Press overhead with tight core and neutral neck.

name: Face Pull (cable)
instructions: Pull rope toward face with elbows high, squeeze scapulae.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press (orig)
instructions: 45째 bench press with control.

name: Cable Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Keep elbows by side, extend fully.

name: Band Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Anchor band overhead; push down keeping elbows stable.

name: Eccentric Wrist Extensor
instructions: Use non-painful movement, lower slowly eccentrically.

name: Chin Tuck
instructions: Retract chin gently to create a double chin and hold.

name: Upper Trap Stretch
instructions: Side-bend neck with gentle hand assistance; hold.

name: Seated Band Row
instructions: Pull band toward chest while sitting tall.

name: Incline Dumbbell Row
instructions: Lie chest-down on incline bench and row.

name: Step-through Lunge
instructions: Step forward and return stepping through; control motion.

name: Single-leg Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hinge on standing leg, keep hips square.

name: Push Press
instructions: Dip drive and press overhead; use leg drive for power.

name: Tempo Goblet Squat (3-1-2)
instructions: Slow 3s descent, 1s pause, 2s ascent.

name: Band Pull-apart
instructions: Pull band apart at shoulder height, squeeze scapulae.

name: Terminal Knee Extension (TKE)
instructions: Anchor band behind knee and extend leg against resistance.

name: Cable Row to Standing (band alt)
instructions: Row to lower ribs maintaining upright torso.

name: Light Cardio Warm-up
instructions: 5-10 minutes light cycling or jogging to increase blood flow.

name: Band Chest Fly
instructions: Anchor behind; control arc bringing hands together at midline.

name: Incline Walking (conditioning)
instructions: 20-30 minutes brisk incline walk

name: Plank
instructions: Perform the Plank with strict form; avoid compensations. Focus on controlled movement and breathing.
precautions: Avoid excessive spinal loading or jerking. Stop if pain occurs.
